job_description:
• Experience with lab test equipment operation including DMM, oscilloscope, power supply, and electronic load instruments.
• Experience with PCB develop tools for EDA like Siemens Xpedition, Cadence OrCAD, KiCad, or similar.
• Contribute to requirements specifications, design documents, test plans, and lab reports.
• Familiarity with digital design including microcontrollers and FPGA devices BS or MS degree in Electrical Engineering or related subject area.
• Less than 2 years Lead Principal Electrical Design EngineerSan Jose, California, United States of AmericaHybridPosted 39 mins ago.
• Proven understanding of Analog Device LTspice, Cadence PSpice, or other electronic circuit simulation tools.
• Knowledge of Python or other scripting languages for automation of testing and analysis.
• Familiarity with PCB layout including power integrity (PI) and signal integrity (SI).
